rows: $\{u: u \in V$ and $(u, v) \in E\}$ is called open neighborhood of node $v \in V$
$O N(v) \cup\{v\}$ is called closed neighborhood of node $v \in V$.
$\{O N(v)\}$, i.e., Total number of neighboring nodes of node $v \in V$ or degree of $v$ in $G$
